description: Create and remove a bcf switch.

access_token.description: Big Cloud Fabric access token. If this isn't set then the environment variable C(BIGSWITCH_ACCESS_TOKEN) is used.

mac.description: The MAC address of the switch.

state.description: Whether the switch should be present or absent.

leaf_group.description: The leaf group of the switch if the switch is a leaf.

validate_certs.description: If C(false), SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only be used on personally controlled devices using self-signed certificates.
